description: Erection of rear dormer roof extension with installation of 2no front rooflights and chimney stack removal
decision_conditions: The proposed erection of rear dormer roof extension with installation of 2no front rooflights and chimney stack removal falls within the parameters of permitted development as set out under Schedule 2, Part 1, Classes B, C & G of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

We note that you have submitted plans and supporting documents that relate to a separate site address, i.e. 4-6 Crescent Road. We must only receive documents in relation to the application site address. In addition, any proposed plans must be considered in the context of the Existing neighbouring situation, whereas you have submitted Proposed plans with Proposals for the neighbouring site.If you wish to apply for a proposal for 8 Crescent Road then please disaggregate the plans and documents.Please confirm how you would like to proceed.
The applicant has also not confirmed the depth of the proposed rooflights so officers are unable to confirm compliance.
